channel.title: Comments on: The Runaways
channel.description: I do! Want my wedding to look fabulous. I don't! Have $20,000 to spend.

item.title: By: Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/the-runaways/#comment-73">JenW</a>.
I know! I've watched it several times, and it hasn't stopped making me weepy!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to JenW.

I know! I’ve watched it several times, and it hasn’t stopped making me weepy!

item.title: By: JenW
item.dc:creator: JenW
item.description: Oh I got all teary-eyed watching that video... it was beautiful.
item.content:encoded: Oh I got all teary-eyed watching that video… it was beautiful.

item.title: By: Denys
item.dc:creator: Denys
item.description: I love this post! The wedding video you provided was wonderful. I have been in a wedding at San Francisco City Hall and it really is such a beautiful place for an elopement. I'm glad you're back!
item.content:encoded: I love this post! The wedding video you provided was wonderful. I have been in a wedding at San Francisco City Hall and it really is such a beautiful place for an elopement. I’m glad you’re back!
